title: MVP: Project scaffold and Go module setup
MVP: List and remove repos (GET/DELETE /api/v1/repos)
description: TDD: List connected repos, remove repo and attempt webhook cleanup. Test: list returns repos with stats, delete removes repo, handles expired GitHub token

title: MVP: Webhook receiver endpoint (POST /webhooks/github/:repo_id)
description: TDD: Receive GitHub push webhook, validate HMAC signature, record delivery, filter non-main branches. Test: valid signature accepted, invalid rejected, non-main ignored, delivery recorded

title: MVP: Fetch commit diffs from GitHub API
description: TDD: Given push SHAs, fetch commit diffs via GitHub API, handle large diffs with summarization. Test: fetches diffs, summarizes large diffs, handles API errors

title: MVP: AI content generation with OpenAI
description: TDD: Send commit data + diffs to GPT, generate post text under 500 chars, retry on failure. Test: generates appropriate content, respects char limit, retries 3x on failure, creates error draft if all fail

title: MVP: Draft creation pipeline (webhook to draft)
description: TDD: End-to-end: webhook received -> diffs fetched -> AI generates -> draft created -> activity logged. Test: full pipeline works, idempotent on duplicate webhooks, handles multi-user repos

title: MVP: Threads OAuth flow (GET /oauth/threads + callback)
description: TDD: Initiate Threads OAuth redirect, handle callback, exchange code for token, store credentials. Test: initiate redirects to Threads, callback stores token, invalid code returns error

title: MVP: List drafts (GET /api/v1/drafts)
description: TDD: List pending drafts for user, paginated, newest first. Test: returns drafts, pagination works, only shows user's drafts, excludes posted

title: MVP: Get/Update/Delete draft (GET/PUT/DELETE /api/v1/drafts/:id)
description: TDD: Get draft details, update edited content, delete draft. Test: get returns full draft, update saves edited_content, delete removes draft, auth enforced

title: MVP: Regenerate draft content (POST /api/v1/drafts/:id/regenerate)
description: TDD: Re-run AI generation for existing draft, update content. Test: generates new content, clears edited_content, handles generation failure

title: MVP: Post to Threads (POST /api/v1/drafts/:id/post)
description: TDD: Publish draft to Threads, update status, create post record, log activity. Test: posts successfully, handles token expired, handles rate limit, idempotent on double-click

title: MVP: Activity feed (GET /api/v1/activity)
description: TDD: List activity items for user, paginated, newest first. Test: returns activities, includes draft_created/post_success/post_failed types, pagination works

title: MVP: Connections management (GET /api/v1/connections, DELETE /api/v1/connections/:platform)
description: TDD: List all platform connections with status, disconnect platform. Test: shows GitHub + Threads status, disconnect removes tokens, handles already-disconnected

title: MVP: Retry failed draft generation (POST /api/v1/drafts/:id/retry)
description: TDD: Retry AI generation for drafts in error state. Test: retries generation, updates status on success, keeps error state on repeated failure

title: MVP: Logout endpoint (POST /api/v1/auth/logout)
description: TDD: Invalidate JWT session. Test: logout succeeds, subsequent requests with old token fail

title: MVP: Frontend project setup (React + Vite + TypeScript)
description: TDD: Initialize React app with Vite, TypeScript, and testing (Vitest + React Testing Library). Test: app renders, tests run

title: MVP: API client and auth context
description: TDD: Create typed API client, auth context for JWT storage, protected route wrapper. Test: client makes requests with auth header, context persists token, protected routes redirect unauthenticated users

title: MVP: Navigation component
description: TDD: Header with logo, nav links (Dashboard, Drafts, Repos, Settings), logout button. Test: renders links, logout clears auth, shows user info when logged in

title: MVP: Signup page
description: TDD: Email + password form, validation (email format, 8+ char password), error display, redirect to GitHub OAuth on success. Test: validates inputs, shows errors, submits to API, redirects on success

title: MVP: Login page
description: TDD: Email + password form, error display, redirect to dashboard on success. Test: validates inputs, shows auth errors, stores JWT, redirects on success

title: MVP: GitHub OAuth callback page
description: TDD: Handle OAuth callback, show loading state, redirect to repo selection on success, show error on failure. Test: processes callback code, handles errors gracefully

title: MVP: Repo selection page
description: TDD: List available repos with checkboxes, select all/none, show already-connected as disabled, submit selected repos. Test: fetches repos, filters correctly, submits selection, handles partial success

title: MVP: Threads OAuth callback page
description: TDD: Handle Threads OAuth callback, show loading state, redirect to settings on success, show error on failure. Test: processes callback code, handles errors gracefully

title: MVP: Dashboard page (activity feed)
description: TDD: List recent activity (draft created, post success, post failed), clickable items, load more pagination, empty state. Test: fetches activities, renders correctly by type, pagination works

title: MVP: Drafts list page
description: TDD: List pending drafts with repo name, preview text, time ago, click to open preview. Test: fetches drafts, renders cards, links to preview page, shows empty state

title: MVP: Draft preview/edit page
description: TDD: Show draft content in editable textarea, character count (500 limit), platform selection (Threads checkbox), Regenerate/Delete/Post buttons, loading states. Test: loads draft, edits save, char count updates, buttons work

title: MVP: Repositories page
description: TDD: List connected repos with stats (post count, last push), remove button with confirmation modal, add repos button. Test: fetches repos, remove triggers modal, removal works, handles expired token warning

title: MVP: Settings page
description: TDD: Show email, connected accounts (GitHub, Threads) with status indicators, connect/disconnect buttons, coming soon placeholders for LinkedIn/Instagram. Test: shows connection states, disconnect triggers confirmation, reconnect works

title: MVP: Password hashing with bcrypt
description: TDD: Hash passwords on signup, verify on login using bcrypt with appropriate cost factor. Test: passwords are hashed (not stored plaintext), verification works, timing-safe comparison

title: MVP: OAuth token encryption at rest
description: TDD: Encrypt GitHub/Threads access tokens before storing in DB, decrypt on use. Test: tokens stored encrypted, decryption works, key rotation supported

title: MVP: CSRF protection on forms
description: TDD: Generate CSRF tokens for state-changing requests, validate on backend. Test: requests without valid token rejected, valid tokens pass

title: MVP: User signup endpoint (POST /api/v1/auth/register)
description: TDD: Register with email/password, validate inputs, create user, return JWT. Test: valid registration returns 201 + token, duplicate email returns 409, weak password returns 400

title: MVP: Rate limiting on auth endpoints
description: TDD: Rate limit login/signup endpoints (e.g., 5 attempts per minute per IP). Test: allows normal usage, blocks after threshold, returns 429 with retry-after

title: MVP: Webhook delivery recording
description: TDD: Record all webhook deliveries to webhook_deliveries table with X-GitHub-Delivery ID, payload, status. Test: deliveries recorded, duplicates detected by delivery ID, status updated after processing

title: MVP: Character limit validation (500 chars)
description: TDD: Validate draft content doesn't exceed 500 chars before posting, show error if exceeded. Test: under limit posts successfully, over limit rejected with clear error

title: MVP: Auto-save draft editing (debounced)
description: TDD: Auto-save draft edits with 500ms debounce, show saving indicator, handle save failures gracefully. Test: edits trigger save after debounce, indicator shows, failures don't lose data

title: MVP: Token expiration detection and reconnect prompts
description: TDD: Detect expired tokens on API calls, show reconnect prompt on Settings and affected drafts. Test: expired token triggers prompt, reconnect flow works, drafts show reconnect message

title: MVP: Partial webhook success handling
description: TDD: Handle partial success when connecting repos (e.g., 4 of 5 connected), show which failed with retry option. Test: partial success shows correct count, retry works for failed repos

title: MVP: Multi-user draft fan-out
description: TDD: When webhook received, create separate draft for each user subscribed to that repo, each gets unique AI generation. Test: multiple users get drafts, content is personalized per user

title: MVP: Loading states for async operations
description: TDD: Show spinners and progress text during operations (Regenerating content..., Posting to Threads...), disable buttons during operations. Test: loading states show, buttons disabled, clears on completion

title: MVP: Empty states for pages
description: TDD: Show helpful empty states with CTAs (Dashboard: 'Push to main to generate first post', Drafts: 'No pending posts', Repos: 'No repositories connected'). Test: empty states render correctly, CTAs work

title: MVP: Backend idempotency for duplicate requests
description: TDD: Handle duplicate POST requests gracefully (double-click on Post), return success without re-posting if already posted. Test: duplicate post request returns success, doesn't create duplicate

title: MVP: User login endpoint (POST /api/v1/auth/login)
description: TDD: Login with email/password, verify credentials, return JWT. Test: valid login returns 200 + token, wrong password returns 401, unknown email returns 401

title: MVP: Toast notifications for user feedback
description: TDD: Show toast notifications for success/error states (Posted successfully, Failed to post, etc.). Test: toasts appear, auto-dismiss after delay, can be manually dismissed

title: MVP: AWS Lambda function setup
description: TDD: Configure Lambda function for Go backend, set up SAM/CDK template, configure memory/timeout settings. Test: Lambda deploys successfully, handles test request

title: MVP: API Gateway configuration
description: TDD: Configure API Gateway with custom domain (roxas.ai), HTTPS, route to Lambda. Test: API accessible via custom domain, HTTPS works, routes correctly

title: MVP: RDS PostgreSQL setup
description: TDD: Provision RDS PostgreSQL instance, configure security groups for Lambda access, set up connection pooling. Test: Lambda can connect to RDS, queries execute

title: MVP: AWS Secrets Manager for credentials
description: TDD: Store OAuth client secrets, JWT signing key, encryption keys in Secrets Manager, configure Lambda IAM to access. Test: Lambda retrieves secrets, rotation works

title: MVP: Frontend deployment (S3 + CloudFront)
description: TDD: Deploy React app to S3, configure CloudFront CDN with custom domain, set up cache invalidation. Test: frontend accessible, assets cached, invalidation works

title: MVP: CI/CD pipeline (GitHub Actions)
description: TDD: Set up GitHub Actions for test, build, deploy on push to main. Test: pipeline runs on push, deploys successfully, rollback works

title: MVP: JWT middleware and protected routes
description: TDD: Middleware validates JWT, extracts user_id, rejects expired/invalid tokens. Test: valid token passes, expired token returns 401, missing token returns 401, GET /api/v1/auth/me returns user info

title: MVP: GitHub OAuth flow (GET /oauth/github + callback)
description: TDD: Initiate OAuth redirect, handle callback, exchange code for token, store credentials. Test: initiate redirects to GitHub, callback stores token, invalid code returns error

title: MVP: List available GitHub repos (GET /api/v1/repos/available)
description: TDD: Fetch user repos from GitHub API, filter to admin access only, exclude already connected. Test: returns repo list, filters correctly, handles GitHub API errors

title: MVP: Connect repos with webhook installation (POST /api/v1/repos)
description: TDD: For selected repos, install webhook via GitHub API, store repo + secret. Test: webhook installed, repo record created, partial failure handled gracefully
